info.author: Jarn AS
info.description:
Introduction
============

This library provides experimental code to speed up BTree difference and
intersection functions, as used by the ZCatalog.

It's been extracted out from
`experimental.catalogqueryplan <https://github.com/Jarn/experimental.catalogqueryplan>`_
now that the query plan implementation has been moved to ZCatalog itself.

Testing
=======

To test, import the monkey patch in other tests, like CMFPlone::

 import experimental.btree

and run the test.

Development
===========

Development of this project takes place at:
https://github.com/Jarn/experimental.btree

Changelog
=========

1.1 - 2011-08-21
----------------

- Update to Cython 0.15.
  [hannosch]

- Correct small/big assignment if only the fist argument is a tree set.
  [hannosch]

- Avoid intersection optimizations if both arguments are non-tree sets.
  [hannosch]

1.0 - 2011-07-29
----------------

- Split off from `experimental.catalogqueryplan`.
  [hannosch]
info.name: experimental.btree
info.html_description:
Introduction

This library provides experimental code to speed up BTree difference and intersection functions, as used by the ZCatalog.

It’s been extracted out from experimental.catalogqueryplan now that the query plan implementation has been moved to ZCatalog itself.

Testing

To test, import the monkey patch in other tests, like CMFPlone:

import experimental.btree

and run the test.

Development

Development of this project takes place at: https://github.com/Jarn/experimental.btree

Changelog

1.1 - 2011-08-21

  • Update to Cython 0.15. [hannosch]
  • Correct small/big assignment if only the fist argument is a tree set. [hannosch]
  • Avoid intersection optimizations if both arguments are non-tree sets. [hannosch]

1.0 - 2011-07-29
